snippet: A massive stage for a Radiohead concert in Toronto collapsed hours before the band was supposed to go on, killing a stagehand and injuring at least three other workers.
abstract: A massive stage for a Radiohead concert in Toronto collapsed hours before the band was supposed to go on, killing a stagehand and injuring at least three other workers.

headline.main: Stage Collapses Before Toronto Radiohead Concert
headline.print_headline: Stage Collapses in Toronto Before Radiohead Concert
